abstract: Bank of America ousted UBS as the world’s biggest wealth manager last year after buying Merrill Lynch, according to Scorpio Partnership, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Bank of America ousted UBS as the world’s biggest wealth manager last year after buying Merrill Lynch, according to Scorpio Partnership, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, lifted by its acquisition of Merrill Lynch, moved ahead of UBS as the world’s biggest wealth manager last year, Bloomberg News reported, citing data from Scorpio Partnership.

headline.main: BofA Becomes Biggest Wealth Manager, Report Says

abstract: Bank of America on Monday promoted two of its senior investment bankers to bigger roles in its combined investment banking group, Bank of America Merrill Lynch.
snippet: Bank of America on Monday promoted two of its senior investment bankers to bigger roles in its combined investment banking group, Bank of America Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America on Monday promoted two of its senior investment bankers to bigger roles in its combined investment banking group, Bank of America Merrill Lynch, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Bank of America Promotes 2 Senior Deal-Makers

abstract: The bank plans to leave a skyscraper in the Canary Wharf district that remains a symbol of Lehman Brothers and its collapse.
snippet: The bank plans to leave a skyscraper in the Canary Wharf district that remains a symbol of Lehman Brothers and its collapse.
lead_paragraph: LONDON  Nomura, the Japanese bank that bought Lehman Brothers’ European business last year, will leave the former Lehman headquarters in London’s Canary Wharf district and move its 4,200 employees further west to the capital’s other financial center.

headline.main: Nomura to Change Location in London
headline.print_headline: Nomura to Change Location in London
